https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/gd3argrGcs6mEHYPmnVHrP11sCG.jpg The Z Warriors discover an unopenable music box and are told to open it with the Dragon Balls. The contents turn out to be a warrior named Tapion who had sealed himself inside along with a monster called Hildegarn. Goku must now perfect a new technique to defeat the evil monster. Dragon Ball Z: Wrath of the Dragon
